title: 4.18 Patch Mega Bug Thread
body:
Hey guys! :D

The new patch is upon us, this could mean Elise  and Kha'Zix sneaked out (they are bugs, see what I did there?).  We can use your help! Help us find them!

Please only report bugs related to the [Patch 4.18](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-418-notes)

When reporting a bug, please include the following. It really helps us quickly identify the problem when we have these information, otherwise it could be very difficult to isolate the issue.

**Type of Bug: **Gameplay, Client, Crash
**Summary of the Bug: ** one to two sentences summarizing what the issue is
**Reproduction Steps:** the steps required to *CONSISTENTLY *recreate the issue
**Reproduction Rate:** If following the reproduction steps, what is the probability of recreating the issue
**Server: **The server which you found this issue - PBE, NA... etc

For performance related issues, please include your system specs. 

You can find an example of a good bug report [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/21gfV9sM-example-of-a-good-bug-submission)

Your help is much appreciated and Thank you! 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**List of Known Issues:**

* {{champion:268}} Missing texture for Azir's HP Bar. 
* {{champion:34}} Unintended Q Targeting changes
* {{champion:41}} R causing him to be disabled
* {{champion:268}} Azir and Jayce Gate interaction
* Cone Spells sometimes casts backward
* Singed Fling sometimes casts backward
* Sion Q and R issue

Hello, after patch 4.18 I'm facing a bug with 's Swipe (cougar's E skill).

Description:
When Nidalee is standing still (not moving) swipe works fine, but the problem is when nidalee is moving (i.e after jumping, or just running).
What exactly happens is that when Nidalee is moving or jumping as cougar and you Swipe she just swipes the opposite direction that she is facing, while she is meant to swipe in the direction of the cursor. So, overall, the cursor doesn't affect Swipe's direction. The skill is just affected by where Nidalee is facing at.
